name: The (Mis)Adventures of Embers
description:
You are Embers, a show dog with a play especially made for you. Today your job is to entertain the crowd, on the beat. Go and be ear-resistible!

Follow your trainer's instructions by clicking with the mouse on the right action or moving objects, then releasing on the beat.

This rhythm game was made on Gamemaker Studio 2  for Extra Credits First Game Design Jam, with "Awesome Per Second" as the theme. In its current state it is in alpha stage and should be updated in the future.

Art, animation, game design  : Railgun - @129un

Programming, music, sound, game design : Oscar Brittain - @moomoomang
